ARABIC LANGUAGE  
CAILS  
   (vii) SOSU and IBADAN accept NCE merit in Arabic and 
other Arts or Social Science subjects.  
  
  
UTME  
(i) ILORIN may accept candidates with no Arabic but 
who meet the UTME requirements.  
(ii) LASU accepts IS in lieu of Arabic or candidates who 
indicate interest in Foreign Language learning and 
possess basic knowledge of Arabic.  
(iii) LASU accepts certificates from recognized Arabic 
Institutions from candidates who might not have 
offered Arabic at the 'O' level.  
(iv) KASU and UMYUK may accept Higher IS or Senior  
IS Results.  
(v) KWASU requires five (5) 'O' levelcredit passes in 
English Language, Arabic, IS, plus any other two (2) 
Arts subjects.  A certificate from a recognized 
Arabic school will be acceptabl e in lieu of ‘O’ level 
credit pass in Arabic.  
(vi) UDU accepts 'O' levelcredit pass in English  
Language, NCE General English and High Muslim 
Certificate.  
(vii) UMYUK requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes 
orits equivalent including English Language,  
Arabic, IS and two (2) other relevant Arts \Social 
Science subjects and a credit pass in 
Mathematics.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
 (i)  KWASU requires two (2) other Arts subjects.  
ARABIC LANGUAGE AND  
LITERATURE

in the relevant 
subjects.

any other Arts or Social Science subject.
